@Wraith_stalks The story is more bad (for me at least) by the fact there is no worth of these victories for the succubi girls,as in hero didn't even question it and pretty much didn't question anything or find it suspicious (or at least caught up too late with realization) and gave no resistance , which was pretty boring and pointless , if they got knocked out , betrayed or anything that got their situation out of control and legit had no chance to resist, would make sense and be better but no , MC's and other males gotta be dum dums  . @cutiegurl18 Ah I see, I would probably know that if I knew the source material. Still doesn't make sense how they managed to set up an entire casino and pretty much kidnap people without anyone noticing.

@Wraith_Stalks the succubi are in cahoots with the Demon Lord (or whatever incarnation of the Demon Lord is trying to take over the world in this Dragon Quest universe), so taking our the Hero is beneficial to them.

Okay but in the long run wouldn't it just be a straight up horrible idea to ruin your hero? He's a hero for a reason, there's gotta be something he's destined to kill, so unless the succubus managed to set up that shop in a town without anyone noticing, it means they're doing it so legally. Knowingly ruining the hero increases the chances of lives being loss, which causes the lost of customers, or even to the extreme point of the world ending. A party of a mage and priestess is poor role wise and I'm assuming there's something special about a hero's moveset for it to be a class of its own. I'm really criticizing porn for it's poor story ain't I?
